## kafka-uroboros package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[AsyncRetryConsumer](./kafka-uroboros.asyncretryconsumer.md)

</td><td>

A helper that can be used with KafkaJS to facilitate consuming messages with retries of messages that were failed during the main consumption process without blocking other messages in queue.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[AsyncRetryConsumerError](./kafka-uroboros.asyncretryconsumererror.md)

</td><td>

A custom error clas that AsyncRetryConsumer may throw

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[AsyncRetryConsumerHeaders](./kafka-uroboros.asyncretryconsumerheaders.md)

</td><td>

Async retry consumer headers. Parses and validates message headers.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TopicNameGenerator](./kafka-uroboros.topicnamegenerator.md)

</td></tr>
